name: supabase-batch-insert-rows
description: Inserts new rows into a database. [See the documentation](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/insert)

table.description: Name of the table to insert rows into

source.description: Whether to enter the row data as an array of objects or to import from a CSV file

name: supabase-delete-row
description: Deletes row(s) in a database. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/delete)

table.description: Name of the table to delete row(s) from

column.description: Search column to find row(s) to delete

value.description: Value of the search column in the row(s) to delete

name: supabase-insert-row
description: Inserts a new row into a database. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/insert)

table.description: Name of the table to insert row into

name: supabase-remote-procedure-call
description: Call a Postgres function in a database. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/rpc)

args.description: The arguments to pass to the function call

name: supabase-select-row
description: Selects row(s) in a database. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/select)

max.description: Maximum number of rows to return

name: supabase-update-row
description: Updates row(s) in a database. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/update)

table.description: Name of the table to update row(s) in

column.description: Search column to find row(s) to update

value.description: Value of the search column in the row(s) to update

data.description: Enter the column names and values to update as key/value pairs

name: supabase-upsert-row
description: Updates a row in a database or inserts new row if not found. [See the docs here](https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/upsert)

table.description: Name of the table to upsert row
